Str.FuncTxt: local func_name = 'get_decrease_heal_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(skill, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(skill.Level)
local func_name = 'get_decrease_heal_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(skill, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(skill.Level)
local func_name = 'get_decrease_heal_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(skill, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(skill.Level)

Num.FuncTxt: local value = 2000; local abilRanger36 = GetAbility(self, "Ranger36"); if abilRanger36 ~= nil and TryGetProp(abilRanger36, "ActiveState") == 1 then value = 4000;end return value;

Str.FuncTxt: if self == nil then return "ATK" end local abilBuff = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") if abilBuff ~= nil then return "BOUNCESHOT_ICE" else return "ATK" end

Str_Arg.FuncTxt: if self == nil then return "I_archer_dividedarrow_force_fire#Dummy_Force", 0.7; end local abilBuff = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") if abilBuff ~= nil then return "I_arrow003_blue#Dummy_Force_effect", 0.7; else return "I_archer_dividedarrow_force_fire#Dummy_Force", 0.7; end

if self == nil then return "F_archer_dividedarrow_hit_explosion", 0.35; end local abilBuff = info.GetBuffByName(self:GetHandleVal(), "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") if abilBuff ~= nil then return "F_explosion104_ice", 0.4; else return "F_archer_dividedarrow_hit_explosion", 0.35; end
if IsBuffApplied(self, "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") == "YES" then return "I_arrow003_blue", 1; else return "I_archer_dividedarrow_force_fire", 1; end
if IsBuffApplied(self, "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") == "YES" then return "F_explosion104_ice", 0.6; else return "F_archer_dividedarrow_hit_explosion", 1; end

Str.FuncTxt: local buffName = "None" local hiddenAbil = GetAbility(self, "Ranger38") if hiddenAbil ~= nil and TryGetProp(hiddenAbil, "ActiveState", 0) == 1 then buffName = "Freeze" end return buffName

if IsBuffApplied(self, "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") == "YES" then return "I_arrow003_blue", 1; else return "I_archer_dividedarrow_force_fire", 1; end
if IsBuffApplied(self, "BounceShot_Hidden_Buff") == "YES" then return "F_explosion104_ice", 0.6; else return "F_archer_dividedarrow_hit_explosion", 1; end

Str.FuncTxt: local buffName = "None" local hiddenAbil = GetAbility(self, "Ranger38") if hiddenAbil ~= nil and TryGetProp(hiddenAbil, "ActiveState", 0) == 1 then buffName = "Freeze" end return buffName

Str_Arg.FuncTxt: local dynTime = self:GetKeyCastTime(); if dynTime >= 1.8 then return "I_archer_highanchoring_force_full_mash_new#Dummy_arrowstart", 1.0; else return "I_archer_highanchoring_force_full_mash_new#Dummy_arrowstart", 1.0; end
